object.name: UniqueGift
object.description: This object describes a unique gift that was upgraded from a regular gift.
object.html_description: This object describes a unique gift that was upgraded from a regular gift.
object.rst_description: This object describes a unique gift that was upgraded from a regular gift.

annotations.description: Identifier of the regular gift from which the gift was upgraded
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the regular gift from which the gift was upgraded
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the regular gift from which the gift was upgraded
annotations.name: gift_id

annotations.description: Human-readable name of the regular gift from which this unique gift was upgraded
annotations.html_description: Human-readable name of the regular gift from which this unique gift was upgraded
annotations.rst_description: Human-readable name of the regular gift from which this unique gift was upgraded
annotations.name: base_name

annotations.description: Unique name of the gift. This name can be used in https://t.me/nft/... links and story areas
annotations.html_description: Unique name of the gift. This name can be used in https://t.me/nft/... links and story areas
annotations.rst_description: Unique name of the gift. This name can be used in :code:`https://t.me/nft/...` links and story areas
annotations.name: name

annotations.description: Unique number of the upgraded gift among gifts upgraded from the same regular gift
annotations.html_description: Unique number of the upgraded gift among gifts upgraded from the same regular gift
annotations.rst_description: Unique number of the upgraded gift among gifts upgraded from the same regular gift
annotations.name: number

annotations.description: True, if the original regular gift was exclusively purchaseable by Telegram Premium subscribers
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the original regular gift was exclusively purchaseable by Telegram Premium subscribers
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the original regular gift was exclusively purchaseable by Telegram Premium subscribers
annotations.name: is_premium

annotations.description: True, if the gift is assigned from the TON blockchain and can't be resold or transferred in Telegram
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the gift is assigned from the TON blockchain and can't be resold or transferred in Telegram
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the gift is assigned from the TON blockchain and can't be resold or transferred in Telegram
annotations.name: is_from_blockchain

annotations.description: The color scheme that can be used by the gift's owner for the chat's name, replies to messages and link previews; for business account gifts and gifts that are currently on sale only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The color scheme that can be used by the gift's owner for the chat's name, replies to messages and link previews; for business account gifts and gifts that are currently on sale only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The color scheme that can be used by the gift's owner for the chat's name, replies to messages and link previews; for business account gifts and gifts that are currently on sale only
annotations.name: colors

annotations.description: Information about the chat that published the gift
annotations.html_description: Optional. Information about the chat that published the gift
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Information about the chat that published the gift
annotations.name: publisher_chat
